summary: RELATED TO NHTSA ACTION #EA02022   2001 FORD FOCUS WITH 38,000 MILES; FUEL STARVATION, SOMETIMES TO THE POINT OF STALLING.  OCCURS WHEN MAKING LONG RIGHT TURNS (INTERSTATE ON & OFF-RAMPS) - PREVENTS ME FROM MERGING SAFELY INTO TRAFFIC.  PROBLEM IS MOST SEVERE WITH LESS THAN 1/2 A TANK OF GAS.  *NLM
